title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 155.8 - Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 155.8 - Appeals

State Regulations

Appeals pursuant to the franchised motor vehicle dealer
act. Section
471-a
(5)
of the Vehicle and Traffic Law provides
that any party may file an appeal of a determination made pursuant to such
section in accordance with section 261 of such law. No such determination shall
be reviewed in any court unless an appeal has been filed and determined by the
appeals board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
155.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
